channel.title: CVE Feed for wpexpertsio -- Email Templates Customizer and Designer for WordPress and WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpexpertsio -- Email Templates Customizer and Designer for WordPress and WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2019-25150|2024-08-05T03:00:19.263Z -- wpexpertsio -- email%20templates%20customizer%20and%20designer%20for%20wordpress%20and%20woocommerce
item.description: The Email Templates plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to HTML Injection in versions up to, and including, 1.3. This makes it possible for attackers to present phishing forms or conduct cross-site request forgery attacks against site administrators.
